abstract: Yahoo‘s biggest shareholders who also hold stock in Microsoft might not demand that Microsoft raise its $44.6 billion takeover offer because there is more to lose from a decline in their holdings of the buyer, analysts at Friedman Billings Ramsey Group said.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo‘s biggest shareholders who also hold stock in Microsoft might not demand that Microsoft raise its $44.6 billion takeover offer because there is more to lose from a decline in their holdings of the buyer, analysts at Friedman Billings Ramsey Group said.

headline.main: Would Yahoo Investors Shudder at Bigger Microsoft Bid?
